00027 #include "LinearMath/btTransform.h"
00028 #include "LinearMath/btAlignedObjectArray.h"
00029 #include "btTriangleShapeEx.h"
00030 #include "btContactProcessingStructs.h"
00031 
00032 class btContactArray:public btAlignedObjectArray<GIM_CONTACT>
00033 {
00034 public:
00035         btContactArray()
00036         {
00037                 reserve(64);
00038         }
00039 
00040         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void push_contact(
00041                 const btVector3 &point,const btVector3 & normal,
00042                 btScalar depth, int feature1, int feature2)
00043         {
00044                 push_back( GIM_CONTACT(point,normal,depth,feature1,feature2) );
00045         }
00046 
00047         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void push_triangle_contacts(
00048                 const GIM_TRIANGLE_CONTACT & tricontact,
00049                 int feature1,int feature2)
00050         {
00051                 for(int i = 0;i<tricontact.m_point_count ;i++ )
00052                 {
00053                         push_contact(
00054                                 tricontact.m_points[i],
00055                                 tricontact.m_separating_normal,
00056                                 tricontact.m_penetration_depth,feature1,feature2);
00057                 }
00058         }
00059 
00060         void merge_contacts(const btContactArray & contacts, bool normal_contact_average = true);
00061 
00062         void merge_contacts_unique(const btContactArray & contacts);
00063 };
00064 
00065 #endif // GIM_CONTACT_H_INCLUDED
